meanings.definition: The state or quality of being clean.
meanings.sent1: Her room sparkled with cleannesses after she tidied up.
meanings.sent2: The cleannesses of the freshly washed sheets brought a sense of comfort.
meanings.sent3: The cleannesses of the kitchen were so impressive that even the dust bunnies were jealous.
meanings.sent4: The cleannesses of her conscience shone brighter than any polished surface.
meanings.sent5: The cleannesses of the hospital room made it feel like a sanctuary.

meanings.definition: The act of cleaning or removing dirt.
meanings.sent1: She took pride in the cleannesses of her daily chores.
meanings.sent2: The cleannesses of the scrubbing brush helped remove the stubborn stains.
meanings.sent3: His obsession with cleannesses led him to invent a self-cleaning vacuum.
meanings.sent4: The cleannesses of her methodical approach to cleaning were unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The cleannesses of the janitor's work made the floors gleam like mirrors.
